tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_reviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  product_id INT,
  rating FLOAT,
  review_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE customer_reviews (
	review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	customer_id INT,
	product_id INT,
	review_text TEXT,
	rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE customer_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE customers_reviews (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    rating FLOAT,
    review_text TEXT
);
